value.title: cubic-bezier
value.description: A web based cubic-bezier generator. Awesome tool for creating custom easings for transitions and animations.

value.title: coolos.co
value.description: A color palette generator. Awesome tool for creating beautiful color schemes.

value.title: icon.horse
value.description: Fetch any sites favicon with a single link. Great for adding images to external links. Like this one!
